inputs.name: sourceFolder
inputs.label: Source Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source folder that the target file pattern(s) will be run from. Empty is the root of the repo.  Use [variables](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=550988) if files are not in the repo. Example: $(agent.builddirectory)

inputs.name: targetFiles
inputs.label: Target files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Files to be converted. Supports multiple lines of match patterns. [More Information](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=708389)

inputs.name: inputFormat
inputs.label: Input format
inputs.helpMarkDown: The input format to interpret the files as. [More Information](http://pandoc.org/MANUAL.html#general-options)

inputs.name: outputFormat
inputs.label: Output format
inputs.helpMarkDown: The output format to convert the files to. [More Information](http://pandoc.org/MANUAL.html#general-options)

inputs.name: standalone
inputs.label: Standalone File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether to output with an appropriate header and footer. [More information](http://pandoc.org/MANUAL.html#general-writer-options)

inputs.name: commandLineOptions
inputs.label: Command line options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Other command line switches to pass to the Pandoc command. [More information](http://pandoc.org/MANUAL.html)
